### Papers directly showing the prognostic value of pattern 4 quantification

Pattern 4 in men on active surveillance: upgrading a questionable endpoint https://www.clinical-genitourinary-cancer.com/article/S1558-7673(24)00174-5/abstract 

Pattern 4 volume best predictor of PSA https://www.goldjournal.net/article/S0090-4295(22)00714-2/abstract 

Pattern 4 volume best predictor of advanced pathologic stage https://www.auajournals.org/doi/10.1097/JU.0000000000004484 

Pattern 4 and 5 volume best predictor of distant metastasis https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666168322005869?via%3Dihub 

Papers where the results are best explained by pattern 4 volume being prognostic 

Tumor volume assessed on MRI prognostic https://pubs.rsna.org/doi/10.1148/radiol.240041 

Clinical low risk cancer at low risk of recurrence even if upgraded at radical prostatectomy https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0302283815002754?via%3Dihub

MRI finds tumors in men with negative biopsy that are not aggressive https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0302283821018674?via%3Dihub 

Papers reporting variation between pathologists in pattern 4 quantification 

Variability in tumor extent by different pathologists https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/his.15372
